prompt: <description>Part 1: Constructing a Rectangular Prism with a Tapered Top and Bottom Step 1: Create the coordinate system Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.5, 0.0] Step 2: Create the 2D sketch Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the created coordinate system with two rectangles as shown in the figure below. ![Rectangular Prism Sketch](https://i.imgur.com/8bBxvxh.png) The sketch consists of 4 line segments: * Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.0] * Line 2: Start Point [0.75, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.625] * Line 3: Start Point [0.75, 0.625], End Point [0.0, 0.625] * Line 4: Start Point [0.0, 0.625], End Point [0.0, 0.0] Step 3: Scale the 2D sketch Scale the 2D sketch with a scaling factor of 0.75. Step 4: Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch Convert the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the rotation and translation defined in the coordinate system, and extrude the 2D sketch by 0.5 units along the Z-axis. Step 5: Define the shape properties Define the shape properties as: * Shape: A rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. * Length: 0.75 * Width: 0.5 * Height: 0.75 Part 2: Cutting a Rectangular Notch in the Bottom of the Rectangular Prism Step 1: Create the coordinate system Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [-90.0, 0.0, -90.0] * Translation Vector: [0.75, 0.0, 0.0] Step 2: Create the 2D sketch Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the created coordinate system with a rectangle as shown in the figure below. ![Rectangular Notch Sketch](https://i.imgur.com/HDALqsO.png) The sketch consists of 3 line segments: * Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.5, 0.0] * Line 2: Start Point [0.5, 0.0], End Point [0.5, 0.4907] * Line 3: Start Point [0.5, 0.4907], End Point [0.0, 0.0] Step 3: Scale the 2D sketch Scale the 2D sketch with a scaling factor of 0.5. Step 4: Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch Convert the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the rotation and translation defined in the coordinate system, and extrude the 2D sketch by 0.5 units along the negative Z-axis. Step 5: Define the shape properties Define the shape properties as: * Shape: A three-dimensional, rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. * Length: 0.5 * Width: 0.5 * Height: 0.5 *Note: The final shape will be a combination of the two solids obtained from Part 1 and Part 2.*</description>
